column5: Hi Phil, bring us up to date on what's been going on with you.  It's good to see you on the board.  By the way, all Canadians are smart compared to you and me.
Don't sell yourself short Connie...now that Phil guy...welll...
i think phil had rotator cuff surgery yesterday.  not a fun procedure.  he's probably pilled up tonight.
He'll be fine. Appears to be a quick healer that fella.  Be well Phil ! Call Connie to swing by and pick you up to go fishing....
It's all good TG, just a little bump in the road Rough 48 hours but I hit the ground healing Thanks for your concern
Glad to hear you're up and running again Phil, take it easy...  Maureen
Best to you for a quick recovery.  Your surgery is no little deal, but maybe you'll be Dusty's 5th starter by mid season.  Save the third Saturday in May 2008.  We're in for a treat.
Hope the recovery goes well and quickly for you Phil
Take your time getting better Phil, as I have catching all the Southwest Ohio fish under control.
fine tuning your shoulder so you can cast bigger baits, good idea. get well soon.
A couple of photos from May 2007 might speed up the healing process for our buddy.
